ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides functions for fitting a sparse partial least squares (SPLS) regression and classification (Chun and Keles (2010) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00723.x>).
Provides functions for fitting a sparse partial least squares (SPLS) regression and classification (Chun and Keles (2010) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00723.x>).

name: r-spls
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.3-2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-spls
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/spls_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/spls/spls_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16c045555fa0cc27b3cc29a2c72310dc24b6ab5b26953ea7706fa1d675051184

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-nnet
    - r-pls
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-nnet
    - r-pls

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('spls')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('spls')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=spls
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Provides functions for fitting a sparse partial least squares (SPLS) regression and classification (Chun and Keles (2010) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00723.x>).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: spls
# Version: 2.2-3
# Date: 2019-05-04
# Title: Sparse Partial Least Squares (SPLS) Regression and Classification
# Author: Dongjun Chung <chungdon@stat.wisc.edu>, Hyonho Chun <chun@stat.wisc.edu>, Sunduz Keles <keles@stat.wisc.edu>
# Maintainer: Valentin Todorov <valentin.todorov@chello.at>
# Depends: R (>= 2.14)
# Imports: MASS, nnet, parallel, pls
# Description: Provides functions for fitting a sparse partial least squares (SPLS) regression and classification (Chun and Keles (2010) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00723.x>).
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-04 21:53:24 UTC; Share
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-04 23:10:03 UTC
